title: Ayodhya, vicinity packed for all of January as Ram Mandir fervour ripples out
description: Park Inn by Radisson in Ayodhya, which opened its doors on Wednesday, is already fully booked for January 21-22. "It's a fairly busy time. We have 160-key and 50-key hotels in Lucknow and we expect those to be sold out too," said Ajay K Bakaya, managing director of Sarovar Hotels & Resorts, which manages the new hotel.
